InstructionData.Title: OreSorterStep1
InstructionData.Author: Orpheus2468
InstructionData.Instructions:
#Ingots define CopperIngot -404336834 #Copper 1 define GoldIngot 226410516 #Gold 2 define IronIngot -1301215609 #Iron 3 define LeadIngot 2134647745 #Lead 4 define NickelIngot -1406385572 #Nickel 5 define SiliconIngot -290196476 #Silicon 6 define SilverIngot -929742000 #Silver 7 define ConstantanIngot 1058547521 #Constantan 8 define ElectrumIngot 502280180 #Electrum 9 define InvarIngot -297990285 #Invar 10 define SolderIngot -82508479 #Solder 11 define SteelIngot -654790771 #Steel 12 define AstroloyIngot 412924554 #Astroloy 13 define HastelloyIngot 1579842814 #Hastelloy 14 define InconelIngot -787796599 #Inconel 15 define StelliteIngot -1897868623 #Stellite 16 define WaspaloyIngot 156348098 #Waspaloy 17 #Ore define BiomassOre -831480639 define Charcoal 252561409
define IronOre 1758427767 define CopperOre -707307845 define GoldOre -1348105509 define Coal 1724793494 define SiliconOre 1103972403 define CobaltOre -983091249 define LeadOre -190236170 define NickelOre 1830218956 define SilverOre -916518678 define UraniumOre -1516581844 define Reagentmix -1641500434 #Ice define Water 1217489948 define Nitrice -1499471529 define Oxite -1805394113 define Volatiles 1253102035
alias Sorter0 d0 alias Sorter1 d1 alias Sorter2 d2 alias HashValue r0 alias SorterOutput r5 #Init s Sorter0 Mode 2 s Sorter0 Output -1 s Sorter1 Mode 2 s Sorter1 Output -1 s Sorter2 Mode 2 s Sorter2 Output -1 Main:
ls HashValue Sorter0 0 OccupantHash beq HashValue 0 Sorter1Start #User defined code start beq HashValue CobaltOre Wanted0 beq HashValue LeadOre Wanted0 beq HashValue NickelOre Wanted0 beq HashValue SilverOre Wanted0 beq HashValue UraniumOre Wanted0 #User defined code end s Sorter0 Output 0 j Sorter1Start Wanted0: s Sorter0 Output 1 Sorter1Start: ls HashValue Sorter1 0 OccupantHash beq HashValue 0 Sorter2Start beq HashValue Coal Wanted1 beq HashValue SiliconOre Wanted1 s Sorter1 Output 0 j Sorter2Start Wanted1: s Sorter1 Output 1 Sorter2Start: ls HashValue Sorter2 0 OccupantHash beq HashValue 0 Loop0 beq HashValue SilverOre Wanted2 beq HashValue UraniumOre Wanted2 s Sorter2 Output 0 j Loop0 Wanted2: s Sorter2 Output 1
Loop0: l SorterOutput Sorter0 Output beq SorterOutput -1 Loop1 j Loop0 Loop1: l SorterOutput Sorter1 Output beq SorterOutput -1 Loop2 j Loop1 Loop2: l SorterOutput Sorter2 Output beq SorterOutput -1 Main j Loop2
